name: [Bootcamp] Zombie slayer
description:
Zombie Slayer is a tiny survival game made during a Bootcamp in October 2022. 

The goal of this bootcamp was to learn the LUA language and made a simple game in  a very short period of time (2 days).

When I was younger, I always enjoyed the COD : Zombies game mode, and now that I'm capable of developing games, I wanted to make a reference of it in this game.

CONTENT
  • Shoot & movement 
  • Power-ups
  • Wave system

HOW TO PLAY

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to shoot
  • R to reload
  • F to place a mine
